notes: Well-renovated apartment in excellent condition with modern recessed/cove lighting, quality wood-accented kitchen with island counter, clean white tile floors in living area and wood flooring in bedroom. The balcony has metal railings with wide gaps that are a safety concern for a baby/toddler, and the balcony wooden decking is narrow. Living room has good natural light from large sliding glass doors. The entryway has a digital door lock and intercom suggesting a managed building. At 60 ping this is very spacious for a family. No stairs visible, appears to be a single-level flat on the 4th floor.
